The classic game with a twist.
Pieces move from right to left.
When the number of pieces stuck to the left equals the level number, the horizontal board twists clockwise.
After rotation, pieces that were stuck to the left of the horizontal board, now fall onto the vertical board in reverse order.
Lines are cleared, points are gained, repeat!
